articles.author: Liam Dawe
articles.title: ΔV: Rings of Saturn is a game for real space nerds - out now - GamingOnLinux
articles.description: ΔV: Rings of Saturn from developer Kodera Software is a physics-based hard-science mining sim, and the 1.0 release is out now.
articles.content: V: Rings of Saturn from developer Kodera Software is a physics-based hard-science mining sim, and the 1.0 release is out now. It comes with full Native Linux support and it runs quite well on Steam D… [+2489 chars]
